title: How Reliable Are AI Chatbots in Practice? Real-world Insights
description: AI chatbots have emerged as promising tools for enhancing customer service efficiency and streamlining processes. Yet, recent events have underscored the critical importance of backing up AI chatbot promises with tangible actions. Air Canada’s encounter with the repercussions of its AI chatbot’s commitments serves as a stark reminder of the potential pitfalls businesses may face […]
